Front_Yard.Body: As you wake up on a cool morning, you notice the neighboring human's cabin appears empty.

Front_Door.Body: You peek in the front door, and see the house is empty, you smell food inside, but have no idea how to get in.

Choices.Text: Check the back yard for a way in.

Porch.Body: As you wake up on a cool morning, you notice the neighboring human's cabin appears empty.

Enter_Front.Body: The stone is smooth, but doesn't look like any stone you have seen before. It looks fake, like the humans have found a way to alchemize it.

Choices.Text: Leave the stone be, who knows what latent power it might hold.

Back_Yard.Body: The backyard seems bigger than the last time you were here, it seems like the humans have cut the grass. You notice a hot spring that the humans have built.

Choices.Text: Take a dip in the hot tub.
Approach the back door, maybe the humans haven't fully defended their nest?

Hot_Tub.Body: You take a plunge in the hot tub, and feel the warm water soothe your stress.

Choices.Text: Enough relaxation for you, there's a heist to enact.

Contemplation.Body: As you relax in the hot tub, you question your reasoning for wanting to steal food from the humans, and what it means to be a bear at all.

Choices.Text: Choose peace, leave the humans to their food.
Choose cynicism, after all, a bear's gotta eat.

Back_Door.Body: You notice various objects meant to intimidate the wildlife on the porch, some sort of glowing purple effigy meant to destroy insects, and spikes strewn on the inside of the roof, surely meant to impale nesting birds. There is some sort of weird painted stone near the door.

Enter_Back.Body: The stone is smooth, but doesn't look like any stone you have seen before. It looks fake, like the humans have found a way to alchemize it.

Choices.Text: Leave the stone be, who knows what latent power it might hold.

Stone.Body: The stone is smooth, but doesn't look like any stone you have seen before. It looks fake, like the humans have found a way to alchemize it.

Choices.Text: Leave the stone be, who knows what latent power it might hold.

Hideakey.Body: Upon destroying this relic, you notice a glinting metal object, you've seen humans use this to gain access into their nest.

Key_Get.Body: You pick up the key in your mouth, it is cool to the touch, now we can try to gain access to the door.

Effigy.Body: You notice various objects meant to intimidate the wildlife on the porch, some sort of glowing purple effigy meant to destroy insects, and spikes strewn on the inside of the roof, surely meant to impale nesting birds. There is some sort of weird painted stone near the door.

End.Body: You choose to leave the humans to their devices, and seek food elsewhere, calling off what was sure to be the heist of the century.
